user.title: EBUS - Connect
user.description:
Set up EBUS integration. If you have problems with configuration go to: https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/ebus.

Optionally you can configure the monitored messages. Format: CIRCUIT/MESSAGE or CIRCUIT/MESSAGE/FIELD. Separated by semicolon (;). Wildcards and Placeholder (?) are supported. All by default.

wait.title: EBUS - Scan
wait.description:
Congratulations. EBUS connection is working.

EBUS will now be scanned for messages. This takes time. Please be patient.

error.connection_error: Cannot connect. Ensure EBUSD is running on given Host and Port.
error.ebus_error: No EBUS signal. Ensure EBUS is connected.
